headline: Newmont Stock Surges. It’s a Buy as Gold Prices Rally.
summary: Newmont  stock offers leverage to a bullish macro backdrop for gold as the yellow metal’s prices are expected to rally even higher over the next two years, UBS analysts said.  The price of gold has climbed 23% this year to $3,251.30, reaching a significant milestone after crossing the $3,000 mark last month.  Consistent with previous market shocks like the 2008 financial crisis and 2020 pandemic, gold and gold equities initially were sold off and are now booming, the analysts noted.

headline: Frontier pulls outlook, Newmont upgrade: Trending Tickers
summary: Brad Smith, joined by Yahoo Finance Anchor Julie Hyman, takes a closer look at some of today's trending tickers. Frontier (ULCC) pulled its full-year outlook due to the "uncertain environment." UBS raises Newmont Corporation (NEM) to Buy, citing strong cash returns and a supportive macro landscape. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here.
